sentences.sContent: The ghastly minnow is part of the largest family of freshwater fish—but so far its fangs are unique.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ghastly minnow is part of the largest family of freshwater fish—but so far its fangs are unique.
sentences.sCn: 这种面目狰狞的小鱼是数目最庞大的淡水鱼家族的成员，不过其獠牙迄今无其它物种可出其右。

remMethod.val: 注意不要和winnow(v. 簸； 筛选)相混

trans.tranOther: A minnow is a very small fish that lives in lakes and rivers
